src_original: aho aho buddhamanakṣate asaṃ aho aho sāgaramerutulyam /
tgt_original: aho aho buddhamanantatejasaṃ  aho aho sāgaramerugulmam |

src_original: aho aho buddhamanantagocaraṃ audumbaraṃ puṣpamivātidurlabham // Suv_21.2 //

tgt_original: aho mahākāruṇikastathāgataḥ  aho aho śākyakulasya ketuḥ |  aho praṇamyaḥ sa narendrasūryo

src_original: yena dṛśaṃ bhāṣita sūtramuttamaṃ sarveṣu sattvāmanugrahārtham // Suv_21.3 //
tgt_original: yenedṛśaṃ bhāṣitasūtramuttamam || 3 ||  anugrahārthaṃ sa hi sarvasattvān  saddharmacaryāmupadiśya nūnam |

src_original: gambhīraśāstā vira ā samādhiḥ yadanupraviṣṭo inabuddhagocare // Suv_21.4 //

tgt_original: śūnyāśca kāyāstvatha śrāvakāṇāṃ  śūnyā vihārā dvipadottamānām || 5 ||

src_original: te sarvadharmāḥ prakṛtyā ca śūnyāḥ sattvāpi śūnyātma na ātu vidyate // Suv_21.5 //
tgt_original: te sarvadharmā prakṛtiśca śūnyā  sattvā hi śūnyā nahi jātu vidyate || 6 ||

src_original: (Bagchi 127)  nityaṃ ca nityaṃ ca ina smarāmi nityaṃ ca śocāmi inasya darśanam /
tgt_original: nityaṃ ca nityaṃ ca jinaṃ smarāmi  nityaṃ ca śocāmi jinasya darśanam |

src_original: satataṃ ca nityaṃ praṇidhiṃ karomi saṃbuddha sūryasya ca darśanārtham // Suv_21.6 //
tgt_original: nityaṃ ca nityaṃ praṇidhiṃ karomi  saṃbuddhapūjyasya ca darśanārtham || 7 ||

src_original: sthāpyeha nityaṃ dharaṇīṣu ānu atiśokatapto 'smi inasya darśane /
tgt_original: sthāpyeha nityaṃ dharaṇīṣu jānu  śokābhitapto jinadarśanāya |

src_original: rodimi kāruṇyavināyakatvaṃ abhisaṃtṛṣṇāsmi sugatasya darśane // Suv_21.7 //
śokāgninā pra valito 'smi samanta nityaṃ dadāhi me darśanatoya śītalam /
tgt_original: satāṃ varo yadvijahāra nityaṃ  dadāhi me darśanatoyaśītalam |

src_original: sattvāḥ satṛṣṇāstava rūpadarśane prahlādayenmāṃ karuṇodakena // Suv_21.8 //
